name: Cloudinary's Meta Pop!
description: a piece of code parsing a notification hook from cloudinary

UP_PRESET.description: The name of the upload preset you created within you cloudianry account to work with

CLOUDINARY_URL.description: This served as your authentication string for your cloudinary account, you can copy the calue from your cloudinary console

FILTER_DIVIDER.description: This is the string which devides your asset name from the key/value string you added to it. default is __
